response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations and productivity. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, I am confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering this product to you for $9,500. This price reflects a strategic balance between the product's intrinsic value and the opportunity cost for both parties. I look forward to the possibility of discussing how this product can contribute to your business goals. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 9500}
